sentences: Yuuka Yano (矢野 優花, Yano Yūka, born January 6, 1998, in Miyazaki Prefecture) is a Japanese actress.
She played the role of Fuka Igasaki (Shiro Ninger) in the 2015 Super Sentai TV series Shuriken Sentai Ninninger.
In 2015, Yano acted in her first television role as Fuka Igasaki/Shironinger in the 39th Super Sentai series, Shuriken Sentai Ninninger.
